channel.title: Client closes after few steps
channel.description:
whenever i try to move around in servers my client will close after taking a few steps.
heres the error
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841e06, pid=4756, tid=4940 # # JRE version: 6.0_17-b04 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51e06] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Client closes after few steps
item.dc:creator: @darnoc123 darnoc123
item.description:
@darnoc123 wrote:

that didnt work, wont even load the client now

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes after few steps
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

You have windows 7, vista you need to replace this in your run file for the client:

@echo off title run :main cd Files "C:/program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members

Read full topic
